_description: Think on Doomsday — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Gay gay gay gay / Think on drydful domisday’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Euery day thou myght lereTo helpe thiself qwil thou art
                    here…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Thynk the blod fro jhesu ranQuan he deyid withoutyn
                    nay
